description.value: The demigod Raxivort imbues worthy xvarts with magical abilities, and each is given a splotchy dark blue birthmark of a blue hand. The birthmark is hard to find, as all xvarts have dark blue splotches all over their blue skin. The mark can scrapped off, similar to removing a mole, and placed in a vial. The mark has several alchemical uses, but spellcasters may be able to tap into the demigod's power.
